Dingle Peninsula is lighting up today with solid 6 ft @12s WNW swell and light ENE winds at 8 mph. Best spots include Ballybunion Right and Ballybunion Beach, both offering fun conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 3 ft @10s with fresh 21 mph E winds, making it less appealing. Day after, it continues to decline to 2 ft @9s, still blown out by 19 mph ENE winds. Best: today.
